title: K-9 mail crashes after update
creator: kevin275
content: I just updated to K-9 mail 12.0 on CalyxOS 6.10.20 Which is an Android version 15 K-9 mail crashes on startup. Clearing cache does not work. I'm asking here before i clear all data and try again
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/137.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:CalyxOS 6.10.20, android 15

title: In thunderbird mobile app (android) printing e-mails as pdf are not avaible
